transArray.content: The environment is good, the service is very good, and it is relatively clean, but the room is a little small.

After seeing your comments, the service staff in the store are very happy~ It is our honor to bring you a wonderful stay experience. Hanting has always been a hotel based on a clean, safe and reliable hotel environment, as shown on the room card It's the same as written, I love cleanliness and live in Hanting. Let you feel at ease and warm in the hustle and bustle of the city. A self-service laundry room and high-temperature sterilization dryer are added in the store to make your journey safer and more convenient. We look forward to your next visit and we will continue to work hard to give you a better stay experience. I wish you a happy life~
